product_name: Mountain Hardwear Zonal Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The toasty Mountain Hardwear Zonal jacket offers amazing warmth without the bulk of a traditional insulated jacket. Tightly woven ripstop polyester shell fabric is soft, fine and ultralight; Durable Water Repellent finish sheds rain and snow. Thermic Micro(TM) synthetic microfiber insulation is thermally efficient and has excellent loft retention; it's soft and compressible and continues to insulate when wet. Body panels and sleeves are lightly insulated for just the right amount of warmth; stretch side panels enhance fit and breathability. Micro-Chamois(TM)-lined chin guard prevents zipper chafe. Dual hem drawcord provides quick fit options, and elastic cuffs help seal in warmth. The Mountain Hardwear Zonal jacket has zippered handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The toasty Mountain Hardwear Zonal jacket offers amazing warmth without the bulk of a traditional insulated jacket.
